original_title: 人妻オフィスレディの絶対領域 スレンダー人妻を襲う、言いなり社内羞恥―。 竹内夏希
overview: Takeuchi Natsuki decides to buy a house alongside the husband and they also agree for her to look for a job.  Natsuki ends up working for a company whose manager is one of the husband’s customers, Nakata.  Nakata develops an immediate liking for Natsuki and he lays a trap to her, forcing her to commit a mistake at work. Now Nakata has leverage and he forces Natsuki with some outrageous demands.
title: Married Office Lady’s Total Domain: Slender Married Woman Shamefully Does What She’s Told At The Office – Natsuki Takeuchi
